data.title: Official Site
data.meta_description: SAP books from the official SAP publisher: SAP HANA, SAP programming, SAP FICO, and more. The only place for SAP PRESS e-books!
data.text:
Cloud Integration with SAP Integration Suite –

The Comprehensive Guide

John Mutumba Bilay, Shashank Singh, Swati Singh, Peter Gutsche, Mandy Krimmel

900 pages, hardcover

Bring your cloud and on-premise applications together with Cloud Integration (formerly SAP Cloud Platform Integration) in SAP Integration Suite! Integrate processes and data in your system, step by step, by developing and configuring integration flows in the SAP BTP, Cloud … More about the book
